items.details:
Reading

The relationships in nature poster is due tomorrow. 

Please decorate it and bring it to school.

The spelling test is tomorrow

Please prepare the following words.

ancient
climate
cling
custom
decay
disturb
expose
perform
remote
timid
ability
avoid
bashful
brief
compete
consider
delightful
honor
reflex
remark

Extra reading 

TO IMPROVE READING AND EMBED LEARNING, YOU SHOULD BE LOGGING INTO READWORKS

Please go to ReadWorks and complete some of the stories assigned. They will assist you with your schoolwork and also enhance your overall reading skills.

Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it.

Math

Complete Additional Practice 8-2 student book and homework book.

I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data.

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night
 at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Social Studies (DUE MONDAY)

Read and complete 142-145 in the social studies textbook and complete the worksheet. 

Language Arts

Complete pages 106-107 in the grammar workshop book.

Job World Homework (Due tomorrow)

Please complete the future job worksheets.

Science

Jiwoo will be doing a science experiment tomorrow in the science room.

Please have students bring one shoelace or a piece of string and one paper plate.

If you do not have these items, do not worry — students can share them.

If you have a few extra items at home, please feel free to bring them along. Thank you.

Great job to the students who won prizes for Best Winter Reader. I’m so proud of how hard all my students read. Even if you didn’t get a prize, I know how much effort you put into reading every week.
Also, great job to Jiwoo with the Your Idol performance. You did a great job and should be very proud of yourself.
